<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file Shape utility for AMX.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// AMX hardware requires to config the shape of tile data register before use.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The 2D shape includes row and column. In AMX intrinsics interface the shape</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is passed as 1st and 2nd parameter and they are lowered as the 1st and 2nd</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// machine operand of AMX pseudo instructions. ShapeT class is to facilitate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tile config and register allocator. The row and column are machine operand</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of AMX pseudo instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ImmShapes.size() / 2 &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Get invalid imm row from id!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shapet/#afba030ce35f16a36402913ac53ca7889"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shapet/#afba030ce35f16a36402913ac53ca7889">isValid</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Row != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &amp;&amp; (Col != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All def must be the same value, otherwise it is invalid MIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the immediate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      int64&#95;t Imm = InvalidImmShape;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of rows of 2nd destination buffer is assigned by the one of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1st destination buffer. If the column size is equal to zero, the row</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size should be reset to zero too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ColImm == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        Row = Col;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Multiple Shapes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
